columns.name: Email
columns.description: The user's email address.
columns.caption: Email

columns.name: EntityId
columns.description: The user's unique entity id.
columns.caption: Entity Id

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: The id of the user who created this user account.
columns.caption: Created By

columns.name: Created
columns.description: The date and time this user account was created.
columns.caption: Created

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: The id of the user who last modified this user account.
columns.caption: Modified By

columns.name: Modified
columns.description: The date and time this user account was last modified.
columns.caption: Modified

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The unique id of this user.
columns.caption: User Id

columns.name: DisplayName
columns.description: The user's display name.
columns.caption: Display Name

columns.name: LastLogin
columns.description: The date and time this user last logged in to the system.
columns.caption: Last Login

columns.name: ExpirationDate
columns.description: The date this user account expires.
columns.caption: Expiration Date

columns.name: Active
columns.description: True if this user is active, false otherwise. Inactive users are not allowed to sign in.
columns.caption: Active

columns.name: HasPassword
columns.description: True if this user has the ability to login via a hashed password stored in the database. If false, the user can login only via an external authentication mechanism that has been configured, such as an LDAP server, Active Directory, or a single-sign-on protocol like SAML or CAS. A site administrator can give a user the ability to create a database password by clicking the "Create Password" button on that user's details page.
columns.caption: Has Password

columns.name: Groups
columns.description: List of the user's group memberships.
columns.caption: Groups

columns.name: Avatar
columns.description: Thumbnail icon associated with this user account.
columns.caption: Avatar

description: Contains all users who are members of the current project. The data in this table are available only to users who are signed-in (not guests). Guests see no rows. Signed-in users see the columns UserId, EntityId, and DisplayName. Users granted the 'See User and Group Details' role see all standard and custom columns.
title: Users

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The unique id of this user.
columns.caption: User Id

columns.name: DisplayName
columns.description: The user's display name.
columns.caption: Display Name

columns.caption: Email

columns.description: True if this user is active, false otherwise. Inactive users are not allowed to sign in.

columns.description: True if this user has the ability to login via a hashed password stored in the database. If false, the user can login only via an external authentication mechanism that has been configured, such as an LDAP server, Active Directory, or a single-sign-on protocol like SAML or CAS. A site administrator can give a user the ability to create a database password by clicking the "Create Password" button on that user's details page.
columns.caption: Has Password

columns.name: LastLogin
columns.description: The date and time this user last logged in to the system.
columns.caption: Last Login

columns.caption: Created
